Row.Text: Can restore full [ICON_Movement] Movement next time finishing a build action.

Prefers to build each different kind of district, clear all features and improve all possible tiles. Likes civilizations with a high percentage of improved tiles. Dislikes civilizations with low percentage of improved tiles.
Keqing is watching your progress on improving your territory
Tries to maximize [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes. Likes civilizations that don't establish any [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to her, dislikes those who do so.
If you feel strongly about something, you should speak up and take action. That's the philosophy I live by.
Great, having another trick up my sleeve gives me more flexibility.
We don't need a friendship of this kind. We are capable of working through the challenges we face on our own strength.

Given that Liyue is about to undergo a radical transformation, a favorable international environment is in great demand. With you accepting our friendship, I could spare myself a great deal of trouble.
I have a lot of respect for you. Not everyone has the guts to do right things.
War? Ugh, let us finish this quickly. With sword, comes shadow!
Come on. Enough procrastinating. Let us cut to the chase: war is upon us.
Not bad, as far as gifts are concerned. Let us on to the next.
Gifts? Uh... I still have a handful of things on my to-do list, and I'll receive your delegation once they are done.

Our delegation have got gifts for you: a lantern stays alight for a long time, and golden shrimp balls. The taste of a single golden shrimp ball brings so much joy that all the stress of work just melts away.
You just poke your nose into everything that's going on for some reason... You baffle me a lot - how exactly do any of your actions contribute to the longevity of your country?
Don't you have any principle? Hmm, or maybe being untrustworthy is your principle? (Denounces You)
I am Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. We live in an era of change. Join me. Let us bear witness to this historical moment together.
Liyue is a vast place with abundant resources. Come and visit our city nearby. I will show you around, and you deserve to see its rebirth with your own eyes.
Let's go, time is against us.
Birds must first possess a yearning for the boundless skies before you would have any inclination to try to fly. For me, Liyue is that boundless sky. What is your capital like?
I have huge respect for you! When your heart is set on something, you get closer to your goal with each passing day.
When you drag your heels on one thing, you're actually causing chaos for a whole bunch of other connected issues, too. You should never put off until tomorrow what you can do today...
The more time we spend together, the more I think you're the person of my dreams — An alliance with you is a crucial part of my dreams for the new Liyue.
Your army is at my borders... They must be moved away at once. Let this be a lesson to those who said, "I'll strike it later."
Right idea, wrong time... I will not go quietly...
This deal is of irresistible appeal.
You always have to seize the opportunity while it's there.
Keqing and workers in the charge of her never procrastinate, and aim to improve every single tile in their empire.

Liyue under Keqing's lead can occupy beneficial terrain with their agile Settlers and purchase Builders that can move instantly after purchase to improve tiles around their cities, accelerating development of Liyue - which can be essential to any victory type. By constructing Mines and Liyue Harbor, Liyue can earn a considerable amount of [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Ningguang knows everything happening in Liyue harbor, her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.
Ningguang has powerful intelligence and anti-spy abilities, this make sure no one can damage Liyue in dark. As a professional businesswoman, she can earn extra profit from international businesses.
Gamblers always place their bets on the next dice roll... But the bankers always have the last laugh, and they never touch a single die.
Cashing in time for power... Interesting. This shows its true value.
I should really consider whether the investment is worth it some more.
I'm usually not so quick to place my trust in others, but it seems I will no longer be able to make such claims. You've done splendidly. If only I had your friendship...
Haha, seems I win again - I put my investment on the right person.
Seize the opportunity, and don't disappoint me.
There's no style in resorting to violence, it's simply the worst of all the bad decisions you could make.
Your delegation will be treated in the Jade Chamber... if you can afford the price.
If you're ever thinking of gifting me such things, you'd be better off just giving the Mora to me directly.
We have sent you a delegation with gifts of Liyue's finest brocades, woven from silk flowers. You can use it to have some clothing made.
Those who have different beliefs should not work together.
All that can be said has been said — both the good and the bad — but you still do as you please. Get out of my sight. (Denounces You)
I am Ningguang, Tianquan of Qixing. You wish to trade? Mora doesn't grow on trees.
Have you learned to observe? Then observe our city nearby. Observe it right down to its very core.
I suppose you've heard enough rumors about my capital. Hehe... What kind of city is it? I shall leave that for you to decide... Of course, your judgement will become a part of the rumor.
You can learn from me, and use Mora to make things a little easier on yourself. But remember, relationships built on Mora can only be relied on for a time.
Even if an antique is priceless, the happiness it brings lasts for only the moment you obtain it.
I've been thinking about something lately. If I were to form an alliance with you, perhaps... at the right time, I might be able to leverage Liyue to...
Borders? If I told you we are aware of your army for long, do you still think you are a perfect hunter? And if you ever make the mistake of sparking a war...
Is this the end of Tianquan? The victor has been decided...
Wealth... why settle for less than more?
The secretary of the Liyue Qixing
The secretary of the Liyue Qixing
Ganyu is the architect of administrative efficiency.[NEWLINE]She cares of the civilians' livelihood, provides bonus in multiple areas.
Drink only spring water, eat only whole grain. Proceed with elegance, avoid certain peril.

For the Liyue Qixing of the lofty Yujing Terrace, Ganyu is not merely a companion to serve them, but is instead coordinator of the web of information that moves across Liyue Harbor, and the architect of administrative efficiency.[NEWLINE]Complex meeting minutes, disorderly report data... Every day piles of documents flow by like water, each one personally compiled by her into clear and concise words in order to assist the Qixing's every decision and negotiation as they flow through various organizational departments.

In the eons that have gone by, the Qixing have changed with each succession of their posts, while only Ganyu has lived to see the flourishing of Liyue Harbor from beginning to the modern day.[NEWLINE]The human blood that runs through her veins makes her reluctant to leave the splendor of the city lights, while her adeptus side leads her to yearn for the gentle serenity of her adeptal homeland.[NEWLINE]For the half-human, half-adeptus Ganyu, between the bustling sea of people and the ethereal clustered peaks, which is more fitting to call home?
Returns to her work in no time. +3[ICON_Amenities]Amenities。

As the secretary of Yuehai Pavilion, Ganyu undertakes many tasks that ordinary folk do not see. The calculations and data behind the Qixing's every decision in Liyue, as well as every ordinance and regulation that is announced, are all the meticulous work of Ganyu.

Each daybreak she stands by the dock, enjoying her breakfast in silence. Even still, by the time the sun has fully risen, she will have returned to Yuehai Pavilion overlooking Yujing Terrace, to continue to fulfill her contract — one that she signed three thousand years ago with Rex Lapis.
Provide unique ability according to Leader.(Details in Civilopidia)

"Decision helper" provides one of the following bonuses according to Leader: [NEWLINE]For Keqing: +1 Road Level, enable using builders to help constuct districts.[NEWLINE]For Ningguang: 20% discount when purchasing districts, buildings, units in this city.

They are aware that the Liyue Qixing are the cream of the crop who hold the fate of the city in their hands, but the calculations and data behind the Qixing's every decision are far harder to grasp.[NEWLINE]The people understand that the new policies announced each year will change the dynamics of the market, yet none can comprehend how policy is plucked from complex meeting minutes and compiled into something easier on the human eye.
City +10[ICON_Ranged]ranged attack strength，and one extra[ICON_Ranged]shot.[NEWLINE]Ranged units trained in this city gets free promotion.
Provide fresh water for the city. +3[ICON_Food]food for improved crop resource in the city.

How long is a thousand years?[NEWLINE]Long enough for the Glaze Lilies that once teemed throughout Dihua Marsh to be wiped out by floodwaters, and long enough for the thriving settlement that sprung up upon Guili Plains to come to ruin in war.[NEWLINE]How short is a thousand years?[NEWLINE]To Ganyu, it has felt shorter than the blink of an eye.

Throughout a passage of time unimaginable to mortals, Ganyu has been working on all manner of things at Yujing Terrace.[NEWLINE]She recorded the raising and demolishing of every building, and witnessed the rise to prosperity of every industry.[NEWLINE]Ganyu's sense of objectivity towards the passage of time comes from the endless reams of data she must trawl through, and from the ever-increasing number of colors she finds that she needs to categorize it all.

All this time, her mindset has never changed — she constantly wavers between her human and adeptus halves.[NEWLINE]On one hand, Ganyu the qilin finds it difficult to comprehend mortal squabbles. But on the other hand, her human blood reminds her always to hold out hope that she might someday be able to fit in.
Extra available district in city，and the availability to purchase using[ICON_Gold]Gold.
Regional effect from buildings can now spread 6 tiles further. Allow the city to receive[ICON_Production]production bonus from multiple industrial districts.
